name: The Raise
description:
THE RAISE Ascension through professional levels; A corporate hustle

Ascend the corporate ladder to get the raise. From intern to a director to turn the organisation into a success. use the special platforms to reach your goals faster. mistakes can lead to starting over. Work Wisely!
Let the hustle begin!! 

Use left and right arrows or A and D keys for movement.

*note: there is a slight registration issue with the UI buttons.

The game was inspired by doodle jump.

Art, Design and Sounds by Pranay Ramteke

Development by Deepanjali Sarna
